name: Make it a Keychain!
description:
This option may be added to any charm & provides a nice little touch with these added features:

Any item in the shop can be easily transformed into an equally beautiful & useful, every day keychain.

The key chain option comes with a large split ring (sized 1.25" or 3+ cm in diameter) & also includes a glass, heart-shaped bead (3/4" or 2cm wide) dangling from coloured copper wire, hand decorated with small jewels & attached to the keychain split ring with a matching coloured chain. It is slightly more in cost due to the extra, high quality materials being used. Personally tested for durability, this is a gorgeous addition to any key set & is protected from daily wear & tear by our special sealant.

(Images shown are not to scale with each charm available. They are just shown as a general sample. Heart glass bead will always be the same. Coloured beads & wires will be matched to the product purchased with keychain option.)

name: Bumble the Abominable Snowman
description:
This unique piece of Holiday shrink jewelry based on a favourtie, classic holiday cartoon and is only here for a short time with a very limited quantity made & will not be seen again until next year. A special limited edition one-of-a-kind (ooak) charm that can be made into a necklace charm, a Christmas tree ornament/hanging decoration, or turned into a magnificent keychain that can be used all year long.

Bumble is a circle & measures 1.5" (or 4 cm) wide in diameter without ribbon. 

Each charm is sold with an attached split ring & a special holiday ribbon for ease of hanging & ready to gift!

To make your ornament into a keychain, simply select the "Make it a Keychain" Product from the store for an added charge (no additional shipping). Any item in the shop can be easily transformed into an equally beautiful & useful, every day keychain.

**(Chains will be available for purchase next month ~ January 2014)

***Each charm is handcrafted & will be a one of a kind piece & due to the nature of the materials used, each piece has his own character & may differ slightly from the sample photo. Each charm is specially protected with a secret sealant to resist from slight water exposure & everyday nicks & scratches. We recommend that you remove your charm before bathing, exercising, or swimming for the longevity of your jewelry. We have a replacement guarantee that if you experience any breakage in the lifetime of the charm & our shop is still actively open, ship it back to us & we will create a brand new one for you of the same or similar design.

**** Materials used: Shrinky Dink Plastic, Prismacolor Pencils, Metal Split Ring, & Protective Sealant

name: "Ariel, listen to me, the human world is a mess." ~ Sebastian
description:
This little crab thinks he knows everything. Always on the go & is actually right about most everything he tries to warn others about. But will anyone listen to him? ... No. He's stubborn & "crabby" & has his nose in everyone's business. Wait, does he even have a nose? ;)

He is one of the most vibrant pieces in the shop, made predominantly with "Poppy Red," which is one of my favourite Prismacolor pencils to use. He just POPS! The size of this charm after being shrunk is 1.25" x 1.5" (or 3cm x 4cm) & comes with a slip ring in a gold hue. He's an adorable little know-it-all to have dangling from your neck, telling you  just where to go & what to do all the time. Definitely an eye-catching piece!

**(Chains will be available for purchase soon!)

***Each charm is handcrafted & will be a one of a kind piece & due to the nature of the materials used, each piece has his own character & may differ slightly from the sample photo. Each charm is specially protected with a secret sealant to resist from slight water exposure & everyday nicks & scratches. We recommend that you remove your charm before bathing, exercising, or swimming for the longevity of your jewelry. We have a replacement guarantee that if you experience any breakage in the lifetime of the charm & our shop is still actively open, ship it back to us & we will create a brand new one for you of the same or similar design.

**** Materials used: Shrinky Dink Plastic, Prismacolor Pencils, Metal Split Ring, & Protective Sealant

name: "I'm not a guppy." ~ Flounder
description:
Who doesn't love a fluffy, round-faced companion... with scales? hehe

This brightly-coloured, dimly-witted little love bug is always getting into trouble, but not floating around your neck he won't! Surely that's the only way to keep him safe from a "SHARK!" Who wouldn't love to have a friend who's always willing to risk his little neck to save you... even if he doesn't really have one in the first place. ;D

This "non-guppy" measures 1.75" x 2" (or 4.5cm x 5cm) & has an gold-coloured split ring for safe keeping.

**(Chains will be available for purchase soon!)

***Each charm is handcrafted & will be a one of a kind piece & due to the nature of the materials used, each piece has his own character & may differ slightly from the sample photo. Each charm is specially protected with a secret sealant to resist from slight water exposure & everyday nicks & scratches. We recommend that you remove your charm before bathing, exercising, or swimming for the longevity of your jewelry. We have a replacement guarantee that if you experience any breakage in the lifetime of the charm & our shop is still actively open, ship it back to us & we will create a brand new one for you of the same or similar design.

**** Materials used: Shrinky Dink Plastic, Prismacolor Pencils, Metal Split Ring, & Protective Sealant

name: "Things are working out according to my ultimate design!" ~ Ursula
description:
Designed from the very jewelry the Seawitch sports on her own ears, these purple conch shell earrings are handcrafted to look 3D & go perfectly with the 3D-looking, almost glowing necklace charm where the mermaid's voice has been trapped!

You may either buy this pair on their own & sport them in all their glory, or you can buy them as a set (choose the other listing) with the shell necklace charm (3 items in total) for a $4 discount overall & become eligible for free shipping with the Instagram code.

This purchase is for a pair of 2 matching earrings hanging from silver-hued earring hooks dangling from silver split rings. The dimensions of each earring charm is .5" x 1.5" (or 1cm x 4cm) & adds about an additional .5" or 1.5cm when including the earring hook & split ring.

**(Chains will be available for purchase soon!)

***Each charm is handcrafted & will be a one of a kind piece & due to the nature of the materials used, each piece has his own character & may differ slightly from the sample photo. Each charm is specially protected with a secret sealant to resist from slight water exposure & everyday nicks & scratches. We recommend that you remove your charm before bathing, exercising, or swimming for the longevity of your jewelry. We have a replacement guarantee that if you experience any breakage in the lifetime of the charm & our shop is still actively open, ship it back to us & we will create a brand new one for you of the same or similar design.

**** Materials used: Shrinky Dink Plastic, Prismacolor Pencils, Metal Split Rings (2), Metal Earring Hooks (2), & Protective Sealant
